title: Game-Based Learning Design Strategies for Motivating University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Utilizes gamification elements to sustain learner engagement and aims to increase content interaction

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three motivation strategies utilizing game mechanics (e.g., leveling, reward systems).
Learners will be able to directly design a two-week mini-learning module applying gamification design principles.
Learners will be able to measure learner engagement patterns using learning analytics tools (e.g., log data) and propose improvement strategies.

resources: Basic Data Visualization Tools for Learner Analytics

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
